name: TheNewsWorthy
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The NewsWorthy is all the day’s news you need in about 10 minutes. Each day includes the latest in politics, tech, business and entertainment so you’re always in-the-know on a variety of topics. You’ll get an unbiased view of today’s news through a collection of news sources; you never get opinions or just one side of the story. Award-winning broadcast journalist and former TV news reporter Erica Mandy is founder and host of The NewsWorthy. She combines more than a decade of journalism experience with her own voice and style. Available weekdays by 4 a.m. ET. Check out each day's show notes at https://www.theNewsWorthy.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
